Address.value: HARVARD SQUARE, ONE MIFFLIN PLACE,SUITE 400, CAMBRIDGE, Massachusetts, 02138, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Vyome is building the worlds premier platform spanning the US-India innovation corridor. Based in Cambridge, MA, Vyomes immediate focus is leveraging its clinical-stage assets to transform the lives of patients with immuno-inflammatory conditions. By applying groundbreaking science and its unique positioning across the US-India innovation corridor, Vyome seeks to deliver lasting value to shareholders in a hyper cost-efficient manner while upholding global standards of quality and safety.
